item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 24 Jun 2025
item.description:
1. Multi-domain, multi-scheduler Lwt
  2. 15th MirageOS retreat May 13th - 20th
  3. opam 2.4.0~beta1
  4. ML Family Workshop 2025: Call for Presentations
  5. Migrating OCaml.org to Use Dune (Developer Preview)
  6. Send us Talk and Workshop Proposals for Fun OCaml 2025 in Warsaw, September 15+16
  7. A Brief Introduction to Normalization-By-Evaluation
  8. My Second Outreachy Internship's Blog Post
  9. Other OCaml News
